text: Pradakshinam is a 1994 Indian Malayalam film, directed by Pradeep Chokli, starring Manoj K Jayan, Sunitha and Maathu in the lead roles. ==Cast== * Manoj K. Jayan as Unnikrishnan *Sunitha as Sudha, Unni's ex-girlfriend *Maathu as Rahel, Unni's Wife *K. P. A. C. Lalitha as Soudhamini,Unni's Mother *Siddique as Vasu,Sudha's Brother *Balachandran Chullikkad as Gopi, Sudha's Husband * K. P. A. C. Premachandran as Mash *Narendra Prasad as Parameswaran, Sudha's Father *Sudheesh as Reghu,Sudha's Brother *N. F. Varghese as Paily, Rahel's Father *Janardhanan as Kunjikrishnan, Sudha's Uncle ==References== ==External links== * Category:1994 films Category:Indian films Category:1990s Malayalam- language films
title: Pradakshinam
